name: Lead Auto-Assignment & Welcome SMS
data: {"list":[{"type":"eventStartConditional","center":{"x":60,"y":120},"triggerType":"afterRecordCreated","isInterrupting":false,"id":"start001","text":"New Lead Created","conditionsAll":[{"comparison":"equals","subjectType":"value","fieldToCompare":"status","value":"New","type":"all"}],"conditionsAny":[],"conditionsFormula":""},{"type":"task","center":{"x":160,"y":120},"id":"task001","text":"Apply Assignment Rule","actionList":[{"id":"action001","type":"applyAssignmentRule","targetTeamId":""}]},{"startId":"start001","endId":"task001","startDirection":"r","id":"flow001","type":"flow"},{"type":"taskSendMessage","center":{"x":280,"y":120},"doNotStore":false,"from":"system","to":"targetEntity","messageType":"Sms","id":"sms001","text":"Send Welcome SMS","smsTemplateName":null},{"startId":"task001","endId":"sms001","startDirection":"r","id":"flow002","type":"flow"},{"type":"task","center":{"x":400,"y":120},"id":"task002","text":"Create Follow-up Task","actionList":[{"link":"Task","fieldList":["name","dateStart"],"fields":{"name":{"subjectType":"value","attributes":{"name":"Follow up with lead"}},"dateStart":{"subjectType":"today","shiftDays":"1"}},"id":"action002","linkList":["parent","assignedUser"],"entityType":"Task","type":"createEntity"}]},{"startId":"sms001","endId":"task002","startDirection":"r","id":"flow003","type":"flow"},{"type":"eventEnd","center":{"x":500,"y":120},"id":"end001"},{"startId":"task002","endId":"end001","startDirection":"r","id":"flow004","type":"flow"}],"createdEntitiesData":{"sms001":{"elementId":"sms001","entityType":"Sms","numberId":0},"task002_action002":{"elementId":"task002","actionId":"action002","entityType":"Task","numberId":0}}}
description: Automatically assigns new leads to team members using assignment rules and sends welcome SMS to customer. Creates follow-up task for assigned user.

name: Lead 24-Hour Escalation
description: Monitors new leads and escalates to manager if not contacted within 24 hours. Helps ensure timely follow-up on all incoming leads.

name: FOIR & DTI Calculation
data: {"list":[{"type":"eventStartConditional","center":{"x":60,"y":120},"triggerType":"afterRecordSaved","id":"start003","text":"Income/Obligations Updated","conditionsAll":[],"conditionsAny":[{"comparison":"wasChanged","fieldToCompare":"monthlyIncome","type":"any"},{"comparison":"wasChanged","fieldToCompare":"monthlyObligations","type":"any"}],"conditionsFormula":""},{"type":"task","center":{"x":200,"y":120},"id":"task004","text":"Calculate FOIR & DTI","actionList":[{"fieldList":["foir","dti"],"fields":{},"id":"action004","formula":"$foir = monthlyObligations / monthlyIncome * 100; $dti = loanAmountRequested / (monthlyIncome * 12);","type":"updateEntity"}]},{"startId":"start003","endId":"task004","startDirection":"r","id":"flow010","type":"flow"},{"type":"gatewayExclusive","center":{"x":340,"y":120},"id":"gateway002","defaultFlowId":"flow012","flowList":[{"id":"flow011","conditionsAll":[{"comparison":"greaterThan","subjectType":"value","fieldToCompare":"foir","value":50,"type":"all"}],"conditionsAny":[],"conditionsFormula":""}]},{"startId":"task004","endId":"gateway002","startDirection":"r","id":"flow013","type":"flow"},{"type":"task","center":{"x":460,"y":80},"id":"task005","text":"Update Status to Not Qualified","actionList":[{"fieldList":["eligibilityStatus"],"fields":{"eligibilityStatus":{"subjectType":"value","attributes":{"eligibilityStatus":"Not Qualified"}}},"id":"action005","type":"updateEntity"}]},{"startId":"gateway002","endId":"task005","startDirection":"u","id":"flow011","type":"flow","text":"FOIR > 50%"},{"type":"eventEnd","center":{"x":560,"y":80},"id":"end004"},{"startId":"task005","endId":"end004","startDirection":"r","id":"flow014","type":"flow"},{"type":"eventEnd","center":{"x":440,"y":160},"id":"end005"},{"startId":"gateway002","endId":"end005","startDirection":"d","id":"flow012","type":"flow","isDefault":true,"text":"FOIR OK"}],"createdEntitiesData":{}}
description: Automatically calculates FOIR (Fixed Obligation to Income Ratio) and DTI when financial information is updated. Marks leads as Not Qualified if FOIR exceeds 50%.

name: Lead Score Calculation
data: {"list":[{"type":"eventStartConditional","center":{"x":60,"y":120},"triggerType":"afterRecordSaved","id":"start004","text":"Lead Data Changed"},{"type":"task","center":{"x":180,"y":120},"id":"task006","text":"Calculate Lead Score","actionList":[{"fieldList":["leadScore"],"id":"action006","formula":"$score = 0; $score = $score + ifThenElse(monthlyIncome >= 100000, 25, ifThenElse(monthlyIncome >= 75000, 15, 5)); $score = $score + ifThenElse(employmentType == 'Salaried', 20, 10); $score = $score + ifThenElse(dataConsentGiven, 15, 0); $score = $score + ifThenElse(creditBureauConsentGiven, 10, 0); $score = $score + ifThenElse(kycStatus == 'Completed', 20, 0); $score = $score + ifThenElse(loanAmountRequested >= 500000, 10, 5); entity\\setAttribute('leadScore', $score);","type":"updateEntity"}]},{"startId":"start004","endId":"task006","startDirection":"r","id":"flow015","type":"flow"},{"type":"gatewayExclusive","center":{"x":300,"y":120},"id":"gateway003","defaultFlowId":"flow017","flowList":[{"id":"flow016","conditionsAll":[{"comparison":"greaterThan","subjectType":"value","fieldToCompare":"leadScore","value":70,"type":"all"}],"conditionsAny":[],"conditionsFormula":""}]},{"startId":"task006","endId":"gateway003","startDirection":"r","id":"flow018","type":"flow"},{"type":"task","center":{"x":420,"y":80},"id":"task007","text":"Set Hot Lead","actionList":[{"fieldList":["leadTemperature"],"fields":{"leadTemperature":{"subjectType":"value","attributes":{"leadTemperature":"Hot"}}},"id":"action007","type":"updateEntity"}]},{"startId":"gateway003","endId":"task007","startDirection":"u","id":"flow016","type":"flow","text":"score > 70"},{"type":"eventEnd","center":{"x":520,"y":80},"id":"end006"},{"startId":"task007","endId":"end006","startDirection":"r","id":"flow019","type":"flow"},{"type":"eventEnd","center":{"x":400,"y":160},"id":"end007"},{"startId":"gateway003","endId":"end007","startDirection":"d","id":"flow017","type":"flow","isDefault":true}],"createdEntitiesData":{}}
description: Calculates lead score based on income, employment type, consent status, KYC completion, and loan amount. Automatically marks high-scoring leads (>70) as Hot.
